name: Dagger Master
desc: Grants +1 dmg dealt for every stat the enemy has debuffed.
components: (max(0,min(1,target.stats['STR'] - target.get_stat('STR'))) + max(0,min(1,target.stats['MAG'] - target.get_stat('MAG'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['SKL'] - target.get_stat('SKL'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['SPD'] - target.get_stat('SPD'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['LCK'] - target.get_stat('LCK'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['DEF'] - target.get_stat('DEF'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['RES'] - target.get_stat('RES'))))
